The company's classic pant, the Threshold line features a glossy faux-organic exterior, an attached belt, and reinforced knee and shin pads. Additionally, the pants are decorated with non-constructive stitching and include two hip pockets. The Toxic Fog edition features Vaporwear in green across the front left leg.
